org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.misc

Class AgclTransform<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.Switch<T>
      • org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.agcl.util.AgclSwitch<T>
        • org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.misc.AgclTransform<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PSL2NuSMVSpecConverterSwitch
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class AgclTransform<T>
extends org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.agcl.util.AgclSwitch<T>
    Acts as a map (in the sense of transformation/function) from AGCL AST's to AGCL AST'. The main method is map(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.misc.EFunction<org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EMap<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature, T>, T>) which will construct a new Ecore object from the given one, where each object may be transformed according to the appropriate caseX method.

    The client must implement the caseX method for the constructs X that must be transformed. All other constructs will be preserved in the sense that a structurally equivalent copy will be produced.

    Author:
    Ernesto Posse
